languages.text: Пакет данных об изученных Лорд-капитаном планетах был с благодарностью принят Оптиконом-22. Связи династии фон Валанциус с Адептус Механикус были укреплены.
The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.
languages.original_text: Пакет данных об изученных Лорд-капитаном планетах был с благодарностью принят Оптиконом-22. Связи династии фон Валанциус с Адептус Механикус были укреплены.

traits.locale_text: The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.
The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.

The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.

languages.text: 奥普蒂孔22号满怀感激地接受了领主舰长的行星研究数据，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝与机械修会的关系变得更加密切。
languages.original_text: The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.

traits.locale_text: 奥普蒂孔22号满怀感激地接受了领主舰长的行星研究数据，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝与机械修会的关系变得更加密切。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンが調べた惑星のデータセットは、オプティコン-22に感謝と共に受け入れられた。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と帝国技術局の繋がりは太くなった。
languages.original_text: The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンが調べた惑星のデータセットは、オプティコン-22に感謝と共に受け入れられた。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と帝国技術局の繋がりは太くなった。

languages.text: Opticon-22 aceptó agradecido los datos sobre los planetas que ha estudiado {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Los vínculos de la dinastía von Valancius con el Adeptus Mechanicus se han reforzado.
languages.original_text: The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.

traits.locale_text: Opticon-22 aceptó agradecido los datos sobre los planetas que ha estudiado {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Los vínculos de la dinastía von Valancius con el Adeptus Mechanicus se han reforzado.

languages.text: Das Datenset über vom Lord Captain studierte Planeten wurde von Opticon-22 dankbar entgegengenommen. Die Beziehungen der Valancius-Dynastie mit dem Adeptus Mechanicus wurden gestärkt.
languages.original_text: The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.

traits.locale_text: Das Datenset über vom Lord Captain studierte Planeten wurde von Opticon-22 dankbar entgegengenommen. Die Beziehungen der Valancius-Dynastie mit dem Adeptus Mechanicus wurden gestärkt.

languages.text: Les données des planètes étudiées par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ont été acceptées avec gratitude par Opticon-22. Les liens de la dynastie von Valancius avec l'Adeptus Mechanicus ont été renforcés.
languages.original_text: The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.

traits.locale_text: Les données des planètes étudiées par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ont été acceptées avec gratitude par Opticon-22. Les liens de la dynastie von Valancius avec l'Adeptus Mechanicus ont été renforcés.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın incelediği gezegenlere dair veri paketi, Opticon-22 tarafından memnuniyetle kabul edildi. Von Valancius hanedanlığı ile Adeptus Mechanicus arasındaki bağ güçlendi.
languages.original_text: The dataset on the planets studied by the Lord Captain was gratefully accepted by Opticon-22. The von Valancius dynasty's links with the Adeptus Mechanicus have been strengthened.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın incelediği gezegenlere dair veri kümesi, Opticon-22 tarafından memnuniyetle kabul edildi. Von Valancius hanedanlığı ile Adeptus Mechanicus arasındaki bağ güçlendi.
